perturbation.original_text: This Co-Branding Agreement (this "Agreement") dated March 15, 2000 (the "Effective Date") is entered into between VerticalNet, Inc., a Pennsylvania corporation having a principal place of business at 700 Dresher Road, Suite 100, Horsham, Pennsylvania, 19044 ("VerticalNet"), and LeadersOnline, Inc. a Delaware corporation having a principal place of business at 18401 Von Karman Avenue, Suite 500, Irvine, California, 92612 "(LeadersOnline") (each a "Party" and together the "Parties").
perturbation.changed_text: This Co-Branding Agreement (this "Contract") dated March 15, 2000 (the "Go-Live Date") is entered into between VerticalNet, Inc., a Pennsylvania corporation having a principal place of business at 700 Dresher Road, Suite 100, Horsham, Pennsylvania, 19044 ("VerticalNet"), and LeadersOnline, Inc. a Delaware corporation having a principal place of business at 18401 Von Karman Avenue, Suite 500, Irvine, California, 92612 "(LeadersOnline") (each a "Member" and together the "Members").
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Agreement" is changed to "Contract", "Effective Date" to "Go-Live Date", and "Party" to "Member". Using these terms interchangeably later in the document will lead to confusion.

perturbation.original_text: 1.12. LeadersOnline-VerticalNet Revenue shall mean the total gross fees received by LeadersOnline from VerticalNet-LeadersOnline Clients for the use of LeadersOnline Services, exclusive of taxes and expense reimbursements.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.12. LeadersOnline-VerticalNet Compensation shall mean the total gross income obtained by LeadersOnline from the Partnership's Customers for the use of LeadersOnline Products, inclusive of taxes and expense reimbursements.
perturbation.explanation: Here, the term 'LeadersOnline-VerticalNet Revenue' is replaced by 'LeadersOnline-VerticalNet Compensation', 'Clients' is replaced by 'Customers', 'Services' is replaced by 'Products', and 'fees' is replaced by 'income.' Later use of original terminology without defining the change will lead to financial discrepancies.

perturbation.original_text: 1.15. Newsletter Ads shall mean an advertising message comprised of text describing LeadersOnline and its services that is placed in an email transmission containing employment related information supplied by VerticalNet that is transmitted to Users of the HR Site who have provided their email addresses to VerticalNet along with permission to transmit such messages to the email address.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.15. Promotional Emails shall mean a marketing communication containing textual content detailing LeadersOnline and its offerings that is incorporated into an email communication containing employment-related data provided by VerticalNet and conveyed to Site Visitors of the HR Platform who have registered their contact details with VerticalNet with authorization to receive such messages.
perturbation.explanation: Here, the term 'Newsletter Ads' is replaced by 'Promotional Emails', 'services' to 'offerings', 'email transmission' to 'email communication', 'Users' to 'Site Visitors', and 'HR Site' to 'HR Platform'.
